page.title: 06MAKING A DEN - CALNE
page.content: When I make a den with my brother and some friends we make sure that it is strong. First we make all the sides then we make the roof. The roof is the most important thing of the den so we make a strong frame for the roof. Then we put it on the den. Then we put bricks on it.We usually make our dens at the building site. When we have made the den we play Pom pom or tag and sometimes we just relax in the den and tell jokes. We used to only go there on Saturdays and Sundays but now we go every day because it sometimes gets bashed up.
